æ¸¸æˆç®€ä»‹ Twisted World is an adult point and click visual novel oriented on a fictional universe with reversed gender roles. The main plot of the video game unfolds in SlurpyCity, a small city on the brink of extinction following the devastating effects of World War III and the ensuing pandemic. The war triggered the release of a bioengineered virus that drastically altered human sexual chromosomes, leading to new genetic variants and the emergence of a new human gender known as Futanaris. This virus has proven to be tolerable and even beneficial for individuals such as Females and Futanaris. However, it has had a lethal effect on the male population, causing a high mortality rate in this group and dramatically reducing the global male birth rate. The absence and restriction of not being able to have any sexual interaction with a man is leaving all women sexually frustrated and beginning to revolt against the government causing crimes every day. In this game you play as a lewd outsider that died on our world, and got reincarnated into another persons body,Â thanks to making a HUGE deal with the Demon Queen, now you are indebted to her and must help her in her plan of revenge over the angels. ONLY YOU whoÂ hasÂ enough virality and a huge sex drive,Â Â canÂ challenge these sexually frustrated people, andÂ  save humanity from extinction!
